sense.def:
Pripono
-ity
dodajamo pridevnikom, kadar tvorimo samostalnike, ki se navadno nanašajo na stanja, lastnosti ali vedenje. Takih samostalnikov v tem slovarju ponavadi ne razlagamo, temveč jih obravnavamo pri ustreznih pridevnikih.

seg.quote: Their function is to give rigidity.
About this there is unanimity among sociologists.
